column3: â€œJust as port wine is the dessert of wines, Burmese Kush is like a really good decadent dessert. Also known as 'BuKu,' it's an amazing smoke. In the world of the Cannabis connoisseur, this has to be the most aroma therapeutic weed. And the flavor puts this strain as one of the finest Cannabis strains. It has a pleasant pine solvent smell and taste incredibly smooth from a robust Earthy Kush flavor with an undertone of...â€

â€œi love the smell of burmese kush, very strong, very pungent. if i were stuck on an island and could only smoke 5 strains for the rest of my life...burmese kush would be one of them. great cannabis for evening tokers.â€
â€œIf Zen Buddhism was a strain.â€

â€œI picked up some large long buds, reminded me of grinch fingers. Not much of a rock nug, they were open and looked like a bush. A very nice strain, smelled like hard candies. Unfortunately I could only ever last maybe 3 hours before I passed out, sleep was deep and refreshing.â€
â€œIts great for mellowing out and it takes care of pain from arthritisâ€

â€œSo this review is kinda late since it's been a few days since I smoked it, but I really liked this one. I was able to stay up & get some homework done, was super chill & mellow & focused. Dry eyes kinda sucked considering I was doing it all on my laptop  in the wee hours of the night, but it was tolerable. Definitely a strain you would want in the middle of Dead Week when you're stressed about finals. 10/10 would tok...â€
â€œVery good for lack of appetite and insomnia as well as depression. It helped me sleep like a baby.â€
â€œGood head high with good functionality. Less grogginess. Gets the creative juices flowing and feels relaxing and euphoric.â€

â€œA really nice everyday strain. Doesn't lock you into the couch, but has a good body high. Is a bit of a creeper so just wait a minute.  The cerebral high lets you enjoy your mind, or anything else, quite nicely.â€

â€œI love this strain, itâ€™s my go-to nighttime strain as I find it more indica dominant. I use a vape pen from CT Pharm, CT code name (ğŸ™„) Fioraden D. Dosing low itâ€™s consistently a very chill and mellow high. I usually donâ€™t have any issues with anxiety with this, except once when I got a really big hit off my pen, the resulting high was intense and had me bugging a little bit until I fell asleep. So for newbies I reco...â€
â€œrelaxed and stress free, nice at night time (before bed)â€

â€œAll praise to the most high for this sacred herb, my new favorite strain, love the smell, the texture and how it breaks up and of course the irie it gives. Jah Rastafari Haile Selassie I Bless Upâ€
â€œVery good, more indica than sativa I'd say more so from the kush and thas apparent in its smell, not a super hard hitter but definitely can get you chilled out but thought provokingâ€

â€œFantastic , beautiful strain. BUT you need the right pheno . Only one pheno will do, forget about anything else that pops up and bin it. Unfortunately out of 10 seeds you will get different pheno's but the true one that is buku and the one pictured by the breeders should be and should grow exactly how the breeder describes.  Some pheno's take forever to flower and have fluffy buds and basically are not the true strai...â€

â€œI'm really impressed by the effects of this strain.  I enjoy sativas for my daytime activities but would like a little relaxation later in the day when I'm gearing down.  Burmese really fits the bill here.  I'm not looking for a classic Kush indica that'll knock me out but one that's just mellow enough to make the couch fit not adhere.â€
â€œThe perfect medicinal weed!!! Creativity, Pain Reduction, night ime is the right time :)â€

â€œBurmese Kush is a darker brownish green color with dense medium size buds.  The smoke is a little bit harsh & will cause user to cough so may not be best for those with breathing issues.  If a little hacking can be handled a full bodied as well as very heady buzz will follow.  Starting out both sativa & indica influences can be felt with equal ferocity.  This herb is no joke leaving the person who partakes both pain ...â€

â€œI'm really impressed by the effects of this strain.  I enjoy sativas for my daytime activities but would like a little relaxation later in the day when I'm gearing down.  Burmese really fits the bill here.  I'm not looking for a classic Kush indica that'll knock me out but one that's just mellow enough to make the couch fit not adhere.â€

â€œThis Burmese Kush strain for me is the quintessential hybrid. In my top 5 best smelling weed right up there with Pineapple Express a sweet grapey-piney-earthy bouquet . HUGE NUGS. Slighty indica dominant, which for me is a plus. This strain after it sunk in ( 2-3 minute lag for me..) had me turning up the music and actually dancing. Body high sativa side was pretty nice at the beginning. I was talking aloud to myself...â€
â€œLove the smell of this bud.  Very nice buzz.  Great for my anxiety.â€

â€œI find this strain a good mix with scented candles and John Coltrane early in the morning with a blanket and a cool breeze.  Nothing can contain my delight while looking on into the morning light breathing the reshingly sweet scented aroma of Burmese kush trees.â€
â€œFunky! Smelled like a bag of cheese. Really nice high. Well balanced. Good for anxiety and relaxation: flavor was earthy with a touch of sweetness on the finish.â€
â€œInspired / relaxed / busy mind. Not always the best for helping with sleep.â€
â€œSuper crystally, medium green colored nugs, not a lot of orange pistols sticking out.  Really stoney, don't make any plans.â€
â€œSuper crystally, medium green colored nugs, not a lot of orange pistols sticking out.  Really stoney, don't make any plans.â€

â€œTotally caught me off guard. Not too much a special scent to it, very dense bud, yet grindable (which I love). I had 1 nug of this stuff and after smoking a good 2 grams with our water pipe, we decided to try out a taste of the Burmese. And Wow to say the least. Idk who grew the batch I got up here in Blaine @ Evergreen, but I bought as much of it as I could afford the next day!

God help me if I find seeds.......â€
â€œI recently received an 8th of Burmese from my caregiver and its that perfect kinda weed, the kind that puts you into a nice relaxed yet focused stone. Very exceptional budâ€

â€œI have recently started using this strain. two weeks ago I had major spine surgery, you can imagine the pain an discomfort. this particular strain has helped me immensely, with my over all pain.  I am currently using in both forms of flour and pure oil. I am approaching week 3 of recovery and am now currently two days without opioid medication. highly recommend for pain this strainâ€

â€œIâ€™ve seen this strain on the menu multiple times and wondered about it. Iâ€™ve never heard anyone rave about it. Now I know why.
I havenâ€™t been so disappointed in a strain for awhile. Forget Burmese kush. Pass on the buku. Itâ€™s  like a bland tasting chemdawg. Relaxed slightly, happy slightly. Lame af.

I recommend to avoid Bmk.â€
â€œGood level of CBD in this girl. Found it to be a great medicine for my night time leg pains.â€

â€œBurmese is a brilliant strain . The high crepes up on you slowly but delivers a powerful yet smooth cerebral high that fades after 45 minutes to a really relaxed state . Excellent for carpel tunnel .â€
â€œthis thing is definitely a hybrid. feeling great and thinking at home. wouldn't recommend this for going out it's nice and relaxing. in a blunt it would be nice to do something.â€
â€œthis thing is definitely a hybrid. feeling great and thinking at home. wouldn't recommend this for going out it's nice and relaxing. in a blunt it would be nice to do something.â€
â€œdry eyes, bitter on tongue, nice mellow moodâ€

â€œI don't know why I'm writing a review, because everyone has it pretty dead on already. Dark, dense nugs... sour citrus smell, like spoiled orange juice... mellow taste... somehow deeply relaxing but keeps you focused and motivated. The name is perfectly descriptive, really. This is exactly what you'd expect from a OG / kush cross.

By the by, I'm a heavy smoker and I didn't finish the joint I rolled. Smoked about 2/3...â€

â€œBurmese is a brilliant strain . The high crepes up on you slowly but delivers a powerful yet smooth cerebral high that fades after 45 minutes to a really relaxed state . Excellent for carpel tunnel .â€
â€œGood level of CBD in this girl. Found it to be a great medicine for my night time leg pains.â€

â€œLOVE, love, love Burmese Kush! Total body relaxation, feels like my head is floating, pressure in my chest area but in a good way, melts all the pain away (I have a bad hip flexor right now and Burmese Kush caused the aches to go away after icing earlier) 

My fiance also loves Burmese Kush. We giggled a lot together, food tasted amazeballs, and making love was freaking amazing!!!

Definitely not for the first time u...â€
â€œthis strain is killer! very good for insomnia and depression. it has great taste and a good vibe to it. would def recommend!â€
â€œGood level of CBD in this girl. Found it to be a great medicine for my night time leg pains.â€
â€œdry eyes, bitter on tongue, nice mellow moodâ€
â€œVery nice calming haze. Definitely more of a head high. Make even the grumpiest fellow change his vibe. I do not recommend smoking this when you have a headache tho...â€

â€œdefinitely a good one for nausea. fixed me right up and tastes/smells better than a lot of buds for the same price.â€

Gotta be one of my favorite strains, top 10 at LEAST.â€

â€œGreat strong taste and hits nicely, it doesn't cause too much munchies and will leave you zoning into space for long periods of time - smoked at night this will knock your ass down if tired in any way, great sleep with this strain.â€
â€œBuds came out very crystally and covered in nice red and brown hairs. I'd give it a 6 if I could, currently on cloud 17 my dude.â€

Yes sir, I am relaxed! 
Happy smoking my friends!â€
â€œGood floaty"  kind of high
column4: but gave me bad munchies. I much prefer Piefaceâ€"

column3: â€œThis reminds me of some really good green crack. Nice and fluffy, orange hairs, dense. Breaks apart like OG & sticks to your fingers. Smells like cheesy sativa goodness. The batch I got was produced by Frost Factory in OR, 25.50% thc 0% cbdâ€

â€œEverything is in slow motion. Stress is gone, pain is subsiding. I'm melting into this couch. I do like this mellow feeling.â€

â€œthis is my go to currently of all the strains at all the
 dispensories. I got it on sale for 10$ off recently and have never looked backâ€
â€œNot bad.  I like the smell and look a lot.  This was a good movie watching strain. I was just the right amount of stoned to be able to focus on the plot.â€

â€œPretty good Indica dominate strain. I loved the smell. The buds I had were an awesome woody piney smell. I found the effects of this strain trippy. Music took on different dimensions. Have snacks ready cause you will need them. All in all, a decent strain.â€
â€œfn dankâ€
â€œBy far my favorite strand for relaxing at night. Definitely makes me a bit flirty. I find myself just grooving in my room to music then slowly relaxing and passing out. Just lovely.â€
â€œOne of my favorites.â€
â€œGood things stick around like most strains fro T.H seeds. This is a great medicinal medicine with no side effects. Got your Kush with the taste of good ol pine! A must try!â€
â€œHands Down On My Top 5...â€
â€œMakrs you feel with a lot of energy, and want to go do something. High doesnt last long. It gives you a dry mouth for a Long period.â€

â€œThis is a beautiful strain!! The bud was bushy with lots of orange hairs. Smelled earthy and sweet and tasted great in the vaporizer. It was quite the creeper and but very relaxing from beginning to end.  Will definitely be using this one as an evening time sacrament. So thankful to Jah for this blessing.â€

â€œKnocks out nausea better than anything else Iâ€™ve tried, including prescription pills. And the relaxed body with super mellow headspace cannot be beat. Do you give too many fucks about stuff? Then you need BuKu to clear them out.â€

â€œI would not smoke this before bed - very tingly body high but I felt restless. I could smoke a lot with no intense head buzz. It made me very calm and collected. I smoked for pain in my ankle but it seemed to make me concentrate on my pain more and I couldn't sleep. I did not react to this as I do most indica dominant strains.â€
â€œStrong, heavy smoke. I mainly avoid sativas but/and this expresses itself in a way that doesn't make me anxious.â€

â€œGot this in concentrate form looks like sparkly golden sap and it's amazing the flavor almost reminds me of marshmallow. With a total THC level at just about 90% the high was great too, great original rush of energy that quickly dies off and becomes very relaxing with a comfortable pressure behind the eyes. Another great night time strain, or atleast great weekend strain not something that I'd smoke if I had to get s...â€

â€œVery nice smell and taste. This strain will give a great high. If you smoke during the day you will feel very relaxed and focussed. In the evening when you're tired it will just make you lazy and hungry. Very good all-rounder.â€
â€œsome dankk. makes u real mellow /calmâ€
â€œsweet taste and smell, really stoneyâ€
â€œgives good body high.â€

â€œIt was great for sleep, nausea, and appetite(somewhat). I fell asleep less than an hour after smoking. Even up until the morning. I usually wake up repeatedly due to nausea. I was able to sleep in. Great if you need to sleep but have anxiety.â€

â€œburmese kush - relaxing, euphoric, good smooth taste. One of my fav indica dominant strains. Just smoked some and i'm feeling very mellow. You will definitely get a nice body buzz, half a doob is all you really need.â€
â€œReally fruity smellingâ€
â€œgreat strain when you have boring things to do or just a everyday budâ€
â€œAwesome for a kicked-back setting like watching a movie.â€

â€œvery nice smoke. it smells like incense and is a nice smooth smoke. It knocks me out. I'm no beginner. Use cautiously if this is you're 1st or 2nd time at bat. Relaxing. i want more, but it's so hard to find.â€
â€œWarm and fuzzy tingly goodness ^~^ Smells AweSOMme! The taste is something different... But overall feeling priii-tay good.â€
â€œThis is a real good strainâ€

â€œMy first one star review! Looked so nice sounded so good but left me with a flat mellow head. I have a feeling it was the bottom of the sack or plant flowers marble size at best. Got this for the high CBD factor , somebody please make a nice even THC to CBD cross??! It's a great novice starter line to introduce but for the experienced you know what you like...â€
â€œGood mellow feeling smooth taste very enjoyableâ€
â€œEh. The effects were VERY mild and short lived. I didn't find any marked change in any symptoms, and I didn't even get the slightest hint of a buzzâ€

â€œnot the best medicine for me.  indica dominant hybrid. aka BuKu.  very strong but only a moderate pain killer.  not very useful for anxiety or stress.  probably excellent for nausea or appetite inducerâ€
